title: Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve
title_original: Hount Long Sleeve Maxi Dress for Women Fall 2025 Casual Crew Neck Flowy Long Dresses with Pockets

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #285,779 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #3,439 in Women's Casual Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Casual

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Length is not the dreaded 3-4" to long
items.body: I have ordered so many of these from different sellers alway 3 -4" to long. Thus is described as a maxi the same as the others but picture shows shorter. And it is. Im 5'1" and the large fits nicely and the length us at the top of my foot so for me its perfect. Material is nice in my opinion. I might end up wearing leggings under just in case it's more sheer that i think. Read more
items.author: JWarwick

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Truly a Maxi
items.body: This Hount Long Sleeve Maxi Dress is truly maxi length on my 5’4” frame. See photo. The color is vibrant and lovely, and I definitely appreciate the pockets. The fit is flattering. There are no loose threads and the seams are sewn straight, so construction gets a positive nod. I did deduct one star for fabric quality. The fabric is somewhat thinner than I would like, similar to a mid-weight tee shirt. Overall, a wearable dress appropriate for casual or office wear, church, and similar occasions. Read more
items.author: Maz-n-blu

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars quality
items.body: PLAIN AN SIMPLE, SOMETING THAT IS TO EASY TO FIND AT A PLACE WHERE IT ALL IS A M A Z O N Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not true red
items.body: Didn’t love the material. Thin. Red not a true red like in picture, orange red in real life. Read more
items.author: Ingrid

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Price
items.body: So soft and comfortable Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thin material
items.body: Material is a little thin but nice dress. Read more
items.author: Imogene Greer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice - a bit heavy overall
items.body: This dress has a simple, flattering design. The fabric is a bit heavier than expected, so it doesn’t flow as lightly, but that also makes it great for cooler weather. The fit is comfortable, and I really appreciate the pockets — they’re deep enough to actually use. Overall, it’s a nice everyday dress that can be dressed up or down. Read more
items.author: Erica Roth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile dress
items.body: I love this red dress! It’s so comfortable and the red is vibrant and eye catching. Looks great with my skin tone. The styling of the dress is perfect for casual but can be dressed up if needed. It’s a great price and is lightweight. It fits me well! Quality is okay. Read more
items.author: JElliott

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Royal Blue, Black, Brick Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
